title: Chemmeenaa Vinmeenaa Lyrics Anantha Poongatre
stanzas:
Chemmeenaa Vinmeenaa Lyrics Anantha Poongatre

Chemmeenaa vinmeenaa
Chemmeenaa vinmeenaa

kannodu vazhum kalai maana
illai kan thondri
maraiyum poi maanaa

vennilaavin theevaa
aval vellai poovaa
kamban kaalidasan
sonna kadhal thaenaa

Irulai pinniya kuzhalo
iruvizhigal nilavin nizhalo
pon udhadugalin siru variyil
en uyirai pudhaipaalo

ravivarman thoorigai ezhutho
illai sangil ooriya kalutho
adhil otrai vervai thuliyaai
naan urundida maatteno

boomi konda poovaiyellam
iru bandhaai seidhadhu
yaar seyalo.

jannal oaviya chitridaiyo
aval selai kattiya siru puyalo
en penpaavai konda
pon kaalgal avai
manmadha thottathu
maragadha thoongal.

Avale en thunai aanaal
en aaviyai udaiyaai neivaen
aval maeniyil udaiyaai
thazhuvi pala melliya
idam thoduven.

margazhi maadhathu iravil
en maangani kulirgira
pozhuthil en swasathil
kanikindra soottai
en sundharikku parisalippen

mogam theerkkum
mudhal iravil.
oru maega meththai
naan tharuven

Chemmeenaa vinmeenaa
Chemmeenaa vinmeenaa
kannodu vazhum kalai maana
illai kan thondri
maraiyum poi maanaa

vennilaavin theevaa
aval vellai poovaa
kamban kaalidasan
sonna kadhal thaenaa
